Karibo Cbd 35 Mg Infused Hydrating Gel

Brand: Karibo

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: AQUA (DEIONIZED WATER), CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, BIS-VINYL DIMETHICONE/ DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER, CETEARYL OLIVATE, SORBITAN OLIVATE, DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER-3, POLYACRYLAMIDE, C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, CANNABIDIOL (CBD) RICH BROAD SPECTRUM HEMP OIL, HYALURONIC ACID, GLYCERIN, BEESWAX, CARBOMER, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL,

DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER-3, POLYACRYLAMIDE, C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, CANNABIDIOL (CBD) RICH BROAD SPECTRUM HEMP OIL, HYALURONIC ACID, GLYCERIN, BEESWAX, CARBOMER, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
